content.value: Amazing game with great fights and cool, unique designs! Shame I'm so bad at it

Enjoyed the story and characters, and the gameplay was some of the best in the franchise (thanks to the grapple hook). Some parts of the story were weak though, and the open world became quite boring to explore at some parts.

allGames.title: STAR WARSâ„¢ - Knights of the Old Republicâ„¢

content.value: Use of the Star Wars universe

I really enjoyed the combat for the most part, and I loved the pawn system. Also a great selection of vocations, weapons and armour to help mix things up. Sadly, I found the rest of the game to be pretty average, inlcuding the side quests, story, and characters. Enemy variety was also lacking - I fought a cocktrice once, and a chimera about

times. The worst thing about this game is the use of port crystals, or rather the lack of quick ways to travel around the map - it was incredibly boring. Safe to say, if there were better ways to travel in the game, I'd probably bump it up much higher.
I think I did ruin the game a little for myself because I didn't really try out any of the magic vocations too, so that probably contributed to the low score.
Overall, It was a good game with unique elements that was dragged down by questionable decisions. Ultimately, can't wait for the sequel!
One of the best co-op games I've ever played!
One of the funniest games that I've ever played.
Nothing, one of the best games I've ever played.
Also, inventory management is REALLY fun.
Great gunplay and atmosphere, but didn't care much for the characters or story.
Getting all endings, was a bit of a slog at times
Lack of grind (compare to Monster Hunter)

allGames.title: Ori and the Will of the Wisps

content.value: Just as good as the first, which is definitely saying something.
Loved everything about this game, but above all else, I loved the story. Without a doubt one of the best stories I've seen.
Incredibly soundtrack and fantastic combat - not much else to say

not the midi version obviously). Felt the story dragged on a bit, and wasn't interested enough to go back for post-game content, but maybe in the future ðŸ¤·
